title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Publications
body: Publications       Alternative Futures for Fire Management Under a Changing Climate by Koren Nydick and Charisse Sydoriak The Strategic Framework for Science in Support of Management in the Southern Sierra Nevada, California by Koren Nydick and Charisse Sydoriak PARK Science Special Issue: Climate Change Adaptation & Communication Framework for Cooperative Conservation and Climate Adaptation for the Southern Sierra Nevada and Tehachapi Mountains
